name: UpdateWorkspaceName
description:
Update the name of an existing Asana workspace.

Use this tool to change the name of a specific, existing Asana workspace. Only the workspace name can be modified, and the tool will return the complete, updated workspace record.

parameters.name: workspace_global_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace or organization.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace or organization.

parameters.name: include_optional_fields
parameters.description: List of additional workspace properties to include in the response, comma-separated.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: workspace_resource_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier of the workspace resource. This is required to specify which workspace to update.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

parameters.name: resource_base_type
parameters.description: Specify the base type of the resource to update the workspace name.

value_schema.description: The base type of this resource.

parameters.name: workspace_name
parameters.description: The new name for the Asana workspace you want to update.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable this to receive the response in a readable and formatted style. Useful for debugging. May increase response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: opt_fields
parameters.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: workspace_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace or organization.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace or organization.

parameters.name: data.gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.
